minVersion.description: Minimum version required for placing holds on ACH transactions

enabled.description: Whether placing holds on ACH transactions is enabled

startMemoNumber.description: Starting memo number for ACH transaction holds

stopMemoNumber.description: Stopping memo number for ACH transaction holds

daysTillHoldExpires.description: Number of days until an ACH transaction hold expires

amountToReleaseImmediately.description: Amount to release immediately (deprecated - no longer used)
